title: Japan-Bound Flight Played R-Rated Movie For All With No Option To Switch
content: The incident occurred on flight QF59, causing discomfort among travellers, particularly families with children.
summary: The incident occurred on flight QF59, causing discomfort among travellers, particularly families with children.

title: Esmail Qaani: The Iran Quds Chief, Missing Since Israeli Strike On Beirut
content: Iran's Quds Force commander Esmail Qaani has not been heard from since Israeli strikes on Beirut late last week, two senior Iranian security officials told Reuters.
summary: Iran's Quds Force commander Esmail Qaani has not been heard from since Israeli strikes on Beirut late last week, two senior Iranian security officials told Reuters.

title: 2 Chinese Nationals Killed In A Blast In Pakistan's Karachi
content: A massive blast on a road near the airport of Pakistan's largest city killed two Chinese nationals, Beijing's embassy said Monday, after a separatist militant group claimed an attack in the area.
summary: A massive blast on a road near the airport of Pakistan's largest city killed two Chinese nationals, Beijing's embassy said Monday, after a separatist militant group claimed an attack in the area.

title: Off-duty Cop Killed While Breaking Into Neighbour's House In US
content: Recently, the officer was assigned to the Fugitive Unit of the Atlanta Police Department (APD). He joined the department in November 2015.
summary: Recently, the officer was assigned to the Fugitive Unit of the Atlanta Police Department (APD). He joined the department in November 2015.

title: Live Updates: Hezbollah Missiles Target Haifa, Israel's 3rd Largest City
content: Today marks a year after the Palestinian militant group Hamas attacked Israel, triggering the year-long Israeli onslaught on the Gaza Strip. After nearly 1,200 people were killed during the October 7 attacks, Israel vowed to destroy Hamas.
summary: Today marks a year after the Palestinian militant group Hamas attacked Israel, triggering the year-long Israeli onslaught on the Gaza Strip. After nearly 1,200 people were killed during the October 7 attacks, Israel vowed to destroy Hamas.

title: Trump Rallies At Failed Assassination Site A Month Before US Polls
content: Donald Trump's much-hyped return to Butler, Pennsylvania, came exactly one month before the November 5 presidential election, the outcome of which President Joe Biden suggested on Friday might not be peaceful.
summary: Donald Trump's much-hyped return to Butler, Pennsylvania, came exactly one month before the November 5 presidential election, the outcome of which President Joe Biden suggested on Friday might not be peaceful.

title: Maldives President's Diplomatic U-turn, Special Appeal For Indian Tourists
content: The Maldives will not act to undermine India's security and views Delhi as a "valued partner and friend", with cooperation in several fields will "always be a priority", President Mohamed Muizzu said Sunday as he arrived in the national capital.
summary: The Maldives will not act to undermine India's security and views Delhi as a "valued partner and friend", with cooperation in several fields will "always be a priority", President Mohamed Muizzu said Sunday as he arrived in the national capital.

title: Airstrikes In Beirut, Missiles Hit Israel City As Gaza War Completes A Year
content: Israel and Hezbollah exchanged more fire ahead of the first anniversary of the Hamas attack, which triggered a war in Gaza and further escalated tensions in the Middle East.
summary: Israel and Hezbollah exchanged more fire ahead of the first anniversary of the Hamas attack, which triggered a war in Gaza and further escalated tensions in the Middle East.

title: "Completely Transformed Reality": Netanyahu Ahead Of Gaza War Anniversary
content: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu on Sunday vowed to achieve victory and said his country's military "completely transformed reality" in the year since Hamas's October 7 attack, which has left the country fighting two wars.
summary: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu on Sunday vowed to achieve victory and said his country's military "completely transformed reality" in the year since Hamas's October 7 attack, which has left the country fighting two wars.

title: How Gaza Was Reduced To Rubble In A Year - Analysis Using Satellite Images
content: On October 7, 2023, Hamas - a militant group which controlled Gaza - crossed over into Israel and launched 'Operation Al Aqsa Flood', a deadly terror attack, killed over 1,200 people across the country.
summary: On October 7, 2023, Hamas - a militant group which controlled Gaza - crossed over into Israel and launched 'Operation Al Aqsa Flood', a deadly terror attack, killed over 1,200 people across the country.

title: Hamas Calls October 7 Attack "Glorious" Ahead Of Anniversary
content: Palestinian group Hamas on Sunday praised its October 7 attack on Israel in a video message ahead of the first anniversary of the deadly storming of southern Israel which sparked the war in Gaza.
summary: Palestinian group Hamas on Sunday praised its October 7 attack on Israel in a video message ahead of the first anniversary of the deadly storming of southern Israel which sparked the war in Gaza.

title: Chinese Hackers Breached US Court Wiretap Systems: Report
content: Chinese hackers accessed the networks of US broadband providers and obtained information from systems the federal government uses for court-authorized wiretapping, the Wall Street Journal reported on Saturday.
summary: Chinese hackers accessed the networks of US broadband providers and obtained information from systems the federal government uses for court-authorized wiretapping, the Wall Street Journal reported on Saturday.

title: Flights From All Iran's Airports Cancelled Until Tomorrow Morning: Report
content: Flights from all Iran's airports will be cancelled until 6 a.m. local time (0230 GMT) on Monday from 9 p.m. on Sunday, Iran's state media said, citing a spokesperson for Iran's Civil Aviation Organisation.
summary: Flights from all Iran's airports will be cancelled until 6 a.m. local time (0230 GMT) on Monday from 9 p.m. on Sunday, Iran's state media said, citing a spokesperson for Iran's Civil Aviation Organisation.

title: Israel Deploys More Troops Near Gaza Ahead Of Oct 7 Attack Anniversary
content: The Israeli military said Sunday it deployed more troops to defend southern communities and areas bordering Gaza, ahead of the anniversary of the October 7 attack by Hamas.
summary: The Israeli military said Sunday it deployed more troops to defend southern communities and areas bordering Gaza, ahead of the anniversary of the October 7 attack by Hamas.

title: "Wouldn't Have Given Birth...": Gaza Mothers Struggle To Care For Newborns
content: Gazan mother Rana Salah cradles her one-month-old daughter Milana in her arms in a sweltering tent for the displaced, and speaks of the guilt she feels for bringing her child into a world of war and suffering.
summary: Gazan mother Rana Salah cradles her one-month-old daughter Milana in her arms in a sweltering tent for the displaced, and speaks of the guilt she feels for bringing her child into a world of war and suffering.

title: "Appreciate His Commitment To...": S Jaishankar Meets Maldives President
content: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar on Sunday greeted Maldives President Mohamed Muizzu, who arrived in New Delhi for his first bilateral visit to India.
summary: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar on Sunday greeted Maldives President Mohamed Muizzu, who arrived in New Delhi for his first bilateral visit to India.

title: Teen "Stabbed 50 Times" Then Burned Alive In France

title: Long-Lost Part Of Earth Believed To Be 120-Million-Year-Old Found In Borneo
content: Researchers have reconstructed the ancient Pontus plate, estimating it covered an area roughly one-quarter the size of the Pacific Ocean.
summary: Researchers have reconstructed the ancient Pontus plate, estimating it covered an area roughly one-quarter the size of the Pacific Ocean.

title: "UN Like Old Company, Not Entirely Keeping Up With Market": S Jaishankar
content: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar on Sunday took a critical view of the United Nations, saying it was "like an old company", not entirely keeping up with the market but occupying the space.
summary: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar on Sunday took a critical view of the United Nations, saying it was "like an old company", not entirely keeping up with the market but occupying the space.

title: Rockets From Gaza Cross Into Israel Day Before Hamas Attack Anniversary
content: The Israeli military said that rockets fired from northern Gaza crossed into southern Israel on Sunday, a day ahead of the first anniversary of Hamas's October 7 attack.
summary: The Israeli military said that rockets fired from northern Gaza crossed into southern Israel on Sunday, a day ahead of the first anniversary of Hamas's October 7 attack.
